description: Randomly throws an error based on probability, useful for testing error handling and flow robustness.

inputs.name: value
inputs.description: The value to return if no error is thrown.

inputs.name: errorProbability
inputs.description: Probability of throwing an error (0.0 = never, 1.0 = always, 0.5 = 50% chance).

inputs.name: errorMessage
inputs.description: Custom error message to throw when an error occurs.

inputs.name: errorType
inputs.description: Custom error type/name for the Error object.

outputs.name: result
outputs.description: The input value if no error is thrown.
